Review_Text: A strong title, which came to cause, a necessary theme, a documentary to reflect on, an HIV-positive pediatrician, a woman who was born with the virus and the prejudice that surrounds them all, wonderful, simple, well-cut and assembled explanation, it reminds a lot the also powerful "Letters beyond the wall", would be a more modern version, a redesigned on an important subject to be addressed, stripped of stereotyped connotations, wonderful...
